cnn_ae module¶

This is a use case of EvoFlow

We face here an unsupervised problem. We try to reduce the dimensionality of data by using a convolutional autoencoder. For that we define a CNN that encodes data to a reduced dimension, and a transposed CNN (TCNN) for returning it to its original form.

cnn_ae.eval_cnn_ae(nets, train_inputs, _, batch_size, iters, test_inputs, __, hypers)¶

  • train_outputs –
